Name: Bounty Hunter
Details:
Bounty hunters were individuals who could be hired to capture or kill a designated target. The target would have a price or bounty on their heads that would be collected by the bounty hunter upon successful capture or proof of death. Bounty hunters would sometimes team together as part of a larger mission or to handle dangerous targets.

There have been several sightings of 'The Bounty Hunter' over the past centuries, wearing a suit to obscure their identity enough to allow this mysterious figure to remain unidentified by both employers and his targets, except by persona and reputation.

PASSIVE: The Commander gains a very slight Called Shot bonus (roughly 5%).
